title: Create Barcode Scanner Component for VitaTrack
instruction: Implement barcode scanner component for VitaTrack food tracking using device camera. Create camera access, barcode detection, and product lookup functionality. Implement manual barcode entry, scan history, and offline scanning capability. Setup scan result validation, product verification, and nutrition data display. Include accessibility features for users with visual impairments, torch control, and multiple barcode format support. Create scan analytics and user experience optimization.
